parent: ここでは活動で使用するツールである**Gitのインストール**と**Githubのアカウント登録**をする方法を説明します。
## Gitのインストール
### 1. インストーラーのダウンロード
Git公式サイト（[https://gitforwindows.org/?_fsi=LfoGMNmY](https://gitforwindows.org/?_fsi=LfoGMNmY)）にアクセスしてください。 Downloadボタンをクリックしてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.19.19.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/ef24dd58-7dc7-45b9-b5bd-e50f9cd2fa59/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.19.19.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466X755OKGS%2F20250217%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250217T025806Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEEEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQD%2FCAqc1tFCDgPjWv46VCtV5UvqX%2BIDgse4W7oMPyhlswIhANncrX4OLzMBNvQprJ0s%2BaB3EMzfiDTM%2FHZtiUGYfiBHKv8DCGoQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1IgxtEUG0F11kDiBI3egq3APl%2BBQYNlMswPizzv%2BFDaTzLkkdIx3er1gA0RTPb9Ect3w904OvY2pgdHMOymAIEMev%2Ff21A5WRJbkKdTshx2cCmQAnPi4FnfWvUPGVY9agxi0vS9frtoorODq%2B%2BVnSjQB3qsGvHzqOAJ%2BlbKcsGq4kMgk3V47HXjNL6ClC%2BBXvGkrb8Cc1RYVh%2BTHS2ozwWEZDPCWuACEXmkeNY73AYYggLw9bKR94ub3iscCpjC2aH1C%2BgNKM4pYMwUZFBaeRjmrDYikhVFjw%2FwP1tqT7xhj4x%2Be6roF5CiJi5HQ1EkbcYEDMBVoK0x5qC5xMhNIaq5gPvHDQEnb770xfYFFuFi7%2FGmlU00zdR5%2FYFbABCBFBZVMw%2BvjFMzNecpmdqXMkqWzzvVZDSqpc5FmE47JSBDFluG8Hxt1fGsaXp2iTe85yzaPsXPvHo%2F91FJ%2FSuy%2BW4MqBLbLAQkI1UUhqHlZn3t810n9om6LS8DkeldlegmwGgIaYre%2Bqdoa0HwQs5hlUuEPqNrNsQJIYx%2B8%2FvXN%2FoBnCGuxrqeUgB4mdViviwZuTAWEFWUSW%2Bnp7zdLzkLggYnBcuE36x2uOF%2BDFZGLpULjpEMAjW50hEJfB%2BEkPBRYMEXsT5HisAUEWsyCEZDDem8q9BjqkARwPQnpFCGlMYOgyS%2F%2BsBrEV26f19g4G%2FkN9jXn0T43a4pM7SivwJQ8rAwlPRb6giFAvznN2gGHua6ZMv7dL23J4HsvOgpDzAS%2Bu9J8b0W%2BzkRU3vR0fJgPDDECBlIjCXe12mNnrsFgKRTYKNm5Iz%2F%2FO7UaXOR1BudZ9DmCVLMDdPIe9YEaUeZrCTTHvdX9coMG0OwT4fOLDk83BgthXekcDaX0w&X-Amz-Signature=23ec12e062a53050ec0f125360553f401eae2869a2a32c511f56fbd6cfb7a190&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
Gitのインストーラーがダウンロードされます。（※数分かかります）

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.24.48.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/79573433-f039-4aca-9f94-d45271b62a25/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.24.48.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466X755OKGS%2F20250217%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250217T025806Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEEEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQD%2FCAqc1tFCDgPjWv46VCtV5UvqX%2BIDgse4W7oMPyhlswIhANncrX4OLzMBNvQprJ0s%2BaB3EMzfiDTM%2FHZtiUGYfiBHKv8DCGoQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1IgxtEUG0F11kDiBI3egq3APl%2BBQYNlMswPizzv%2BFDaTzLkkdIx3er1gA0RTPb9Ect3w904OvY2pgdHMOymAIEMev%2Ff21A5WRJbkKdTshx2cCmQAnPi4FnfWvUPGVY9agxi0vS9frtoorODq%2B%2BVnSjQB3qsGvHzqOAJ%2BlbKcsGq4kMgk3V47HXjNL6ClC%2BBXvGkrb8Cc1RYVh%2BTHS2ozwWEZDPCWuACEXmkeNY73AYYggLw9bKR94ub3iscCpjC2aH1C%2BgNKM4pYMwUZFBaeRjmrDYikhVFjw%2FwP1tqT7xhj4x%2Be6roF5CiJi5HQ1EkbcYEDMBVoK0x5qC5xMhNIaq5gPvHDQEnb770xfYFFuFi7%2FGmlU00zdR5%2FYFbABCBFBZVMw%2BvjFMzNecpmdqXMkqWzzvVZDSqpc5FmE47JSBDFluG8Hxt1fGsaXp2iTe85yzaPsXPvHo%2F91FJ%2FSuy%2BW4MqBLbLAQkI1UUhqHlZn3t810n9om6LS8DkeldlegmwGgIaYre%2Bqdoa0HwQs5hlUuEPqNrNsQJIYx%2B8%2FvXN%2FoBnCGuxrqeUgB4mdViviwZuTAWEFWUSW%2Bnp7zdLzkLggYnBcuE36x2uOF%2BDFZGLpULjpEMAjW50hEJfB%2BEkPBRYMEXsT5HisAUEWsyCEZDDem8q9BjqkARwPQnpFCGlMYOgyS%2F%2BsBrEV26f19g4G%2FkN9jXn0T43a4pM7SivwJQ8rAwlPRb6giFAvznN2gGHua6ZMv7dL23J4HsvOgpDzAS%2Bu9J8b0W%2BzkRU3vR0fJgPDDECBlIjCXe12mNnrsFgKRTYKNm5Iz%2F%2FO7UaXOR1BudZ9DmCVLMDdPIe9YEaUeZrCTTHvdX9coMG0OwT4fOLDk83BgthXekcDaX0w&X-Amz-Signature=83d4d6fd1adfb205c7f2a24ac1a3685caca7c9ca18e448cb3c2a0480feac0f47&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
### ２. インストール
ダウンロードしたインストーラーをダブルクリックして起動しましょう。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.26.37.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/adee1e38-a96e-487d-9d4c-9279202d7dc0/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.26.37.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466X755OKGS%2F20250217%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250217T025806Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEEEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQD%2FCAqc1tFCDgPjWv46VCtV5UvqX%2BIDgse4W7oMPyhlswIhANncrX4OLzMBNvQprJ0s%2BaB3EMzfiDTM%2FHZtiUGYfiBHKv8DCGoQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1IgxtEUG0F11kDiBI3egq3APl%2BBQYNlMswPizzv%2BFDaTzLkkdIx3er1gA0RTPb9Ect3w904OvY2pgdHMOymAIEMev%2Ff21A5WRJbkKdTshx2cCmQAnPi4FnfWvUPGVY9agxi0vS9frtoorODq%2B%2BVnSjQB3qsGvHzqOAJ%2BlbKcsGq4kMgk3V47HXjNL6ClC%2BBXvGkrb8Cc1RYVh%2BTHS2ozwWEZDPCWuACEXmkeNY73AYYggLw9bKR94ub3iscCpjC2aH1C%2BgNKM4pYMwUZFBaeRjmrDYikhVFjw%2FwP1tqT7xhj4x%2Be6roF5CiJi5HQ1EkbcYEDMBVoK0x5qC5xMhNIaq5gPvHDQEnb770xfYFFuFi7%2FGmlU00zdR5%2FYFbABCBFBZVMw%2BvjFMzNecpmdqXMkqWzzvVZDSqpc5FmE47JSBDFluG8Hxt1fGsaXp2iTe85yzaPsXPvHo%2F91FJ%2FSuy%2BW4MqBLbLAQkI1UUhqHlZn3t810n9om6LS8DkeldlegmwGgIaYre%2Bqdoa0HwQs5hlUuEPqNrNsQJIYx%2B8%2FvXN%2FoBnCGuxrqeUgB4mdViviwZuTAWEFWUSW%2Bnp7zdLzkLggYnBcuE36x2uOF%2BDFZGLpULjpEMAjW50hEJfB%2BEkPBRYMEXsT5HisAUEWsyCEZDDem8q9BjqkARwPQnpFCGlMYOgyS%2F%2BsBrEV26f19g4G%2FkN9jXn0T43a4pM7SivwJQ8rAwlPRb6giFAvznN2gGHua6ZMv7dL23J4HsvOgpDzAS%2Bu9J8b0W%2BzkRU3vR0fJgPDDECBlIjCXe12mNnrsFgKRTYKNm5Iz%2F%2FO7UaXOR1BudZ9DmCVLMDdPIe9YEaUeZrCTTHvdX9coMG0OwT4fOLDk83BgthXekcDaX0w&X-Amz-Signature=3477e84f916eae5278006713eaad96e809461630033483c69a4887ad40daa248&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
あとは「Next」ボタンを押し続けてインストーラーをすすめ、最後の画面で「Install」ボタンをクリックして下さい。（設定値を変更する必要はありません。）
## GitHubアカウント登録
GitHub公式サイト（[https://github.com/](https://github.com/)）にアクセスしてください。
「Sign up for GitHub」をクリックしてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.31.39.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/23992aab-7e58-481d-b855-79492cbb9db8/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.31.39.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466X755OKGS%2F20250217%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250217T025806Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEEEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQD%2FCAqc1tFCDgPjWv46VCtV5UvqX%2BIDgse4W7oMPyhlswIhANncrX4OLzMBNvQprJ0s%2BaB3EMzfiDTM%2FHZtiUGYfiBHKv8DCGoQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1IgxtEUG0F11kDiBI3egq3APl%2BBQYNlMswPizzv%2BFDaTzLkkdIx3er1gA0RTPb9Ect3w904OvY2pgdHMOymAIEMev%2Ff21A5WRJbkKdTshx2cCmQAnPi4FnfWvUPGVY9agxi0vS9frtoorODq%2B%2BVnSjQB3qsGvHzqOAJ%2BlbKcsGq4kMgk3V47HXjNL6ClC%2BBXvGkrb8Cc1RYVh%2BTHS2ozwWEZDPCWuACEXmkeNY73AYYggLw9bKR94ub3iscCpjC2aH1C%2BgNKM4pYMwUZFBaeRjmrDYikhVFjw%2FwP1tqT7xhj4x%2Be6roF5CiJi5HQ1EkbcYEDMBVoK0x5qC5xMhNIaq5gPvHDQEnb770xfYFFuFi7%2FGmlU00zdR5%2FYFbABCBFBZVMw%2BvjFMzNecpmdqXMkqWzzvVZDSqpc5FmE47JSBDFluG8Hxt1fGsaXp2iTe85yzaPsXPvHo%2F91FJ%2FSuy%2BW4MqBLbLAQkI1UUhqHlZn3t810n9om6LS8DkeldlegmwGgIaYre%2Bqdoa0HwQs5hlUuEPqNrNsQJIYx%2B8%2FvXN%2FoBnCGuxrqeUgB4mdViviwZuTAWEFWUSW%2Bnp7zdLzkLggYnBcuE36x2uOF%2BDFZGLpULjpEMAjW50hEJfB%2BEkPBRYMEXsT5HisAUEWsyCEZDDem8q9BjqkARwPQnpFCGlMYOgyS%2F%2BsBrEV26f19g4G%2FkN9jXn0T43a4pM7SivwJQ8rAwlPRb6giFAvznN2gGHua6ZMv7dL23J4HsvOgpDzAS%2Bu9J8b0W%2BzkRU3vR0fJgPDDECBlIjCXe12mNnrsFgKRTYKNm5Iz%2F%2FO7UaXOR1BudZ9DmCVLMDdPIe9YEaUeZrCTTHvdX9coMG0OwT4fOLDk83BgthXekcDaX0w&X-Amz-Signature=9413bd2ea234b542f89357a751dd473da8fc152717bee77c2f1586bc1de035ac&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)

Sign up画面でメールアドレスとパスワードとユーザーネームを登録してください。
Email preferences項目のチェックボックスはチェックする必要はないです（不定期に製品の更新情報やお知らせを受け取るかどうかという項目）。
画面遷移したら「検証する」をクリックしてください。ロボットによる登録でないことを証明するため、画面の指示に従って進めてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.36.37.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/f9e367dd-1db7-428f-a2ed-c68a46952d5a/1173f44b-f803-4554-8c41-235a3d38cf48/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.36.37.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466X755OKGS%2F20250217%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250217T025806Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEEEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQD%2FCAqc1tFCDgPjWv46VCtV5UvqX%2BIDgse4W7oMPyhlswIhANncrX4OLzMBNvQprJ0s%2BaB3EMzfiDTM%2FHZtiUGYfiBHKv8DCGoQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1IgxtEUG0F11kDiBI3egq3APl%2BBQYNlMswPizzv%2BFDaTzLkkdIx3er1gA0RTPb9Ect3w904OvY2pgdHMOymAIEMev%2Ff21A5WRJbkKdTshx2cCmQAnPi4FnfWvUPGVY9agxi0vS9frtoorODq%2B%2BVnSjQB3qsGvHzqOAJ%2BlbKcsGq4kMgk3V47HXjNL6ClC%2BBXvGkrb8Cc1RYVh%2BTHS2ozwWEZDPCWuACEXmkeNY73AYYggLw9bKR94ub3iscCpjC2aH1C%2BgNKM4pYMwUZFBaeRjmrDYikhVFjw%2FwP1tqT7xhj4x%2Be6roF5CiJi5HQ1EkbcYEDMBVoK0x5qC5xMhNIaq5gPvHDQEnb770xfYFFuFi7%2FGmlU00zdR5%2FYFbABCBFBZVMw%2BvjFMzNecpmdqXMkqWzzvVZDSqpc5FmE47JSBDFluG8Hxt1fGsaXp2iTe85yzaPsXPvHo%2F91FJ%2FSuy%2BW4MqBLbLAQkI1UUhqHlZn3t810n9om6LS8DkeldlegmwGgIaYre%2Bqdoa0HwQs5hlUuEPqNrNsQJIYx%2B8%2FvXN%2FoBnCGuxrqeUgB4mdViviwZuTAWEFWUSW%2Bnp7zdLzkLggYnBcuE36x2uOF%2BDFZGLpULjpEMAjW50hEJfB%2BEkPBRYMEXsT5HisAUEWsyCEZDDem8q9BjqkARwPQnpFCGlMYOgyS%2F%2BsBrEV26f19g4G%2FkN9jXn0T43a4pM7SivwJQ8rAwlPRb6giFAvznN2gGHua6ZMv7dL23J4HsvOgpDzAS%2Bu9J8b0W%2BzkRU3vR0fJgPDDECBlIjCXe12mNnrsFgKRTYKNm5Iz%2F%2FO7UaXOR1BudZ9DmCVLMDdPIe9YEaUeZrCTTHvdX9coMG0OwT4fOLDk83BgthXekcDaX0w&X-Amz-Signature=7b555a78a127112c53bb7eb04c2523a8cb287f81ed8fc7083a08a980935a83f0&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
画面が遷移したら、登録したメールアドレス宛のメールに記載されたコードを入力してください。
